ci_notes: CI requires PostgreSQL 15; uses DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost/stream_closed_captioner_phoenix_test. Tests cannot run in workflow without DB service. Elixir 1.16.0 / OTP 26.0.
testing_framework: ExUnit with ExMachina factories, Mox for external mocks (Azure.MockCognitive, Twitch.MockHelix, Twitch.MockExtension), DataCase for DB, ConnCase for controllers, ChannelCase for channels

testing_backlog.title: CaptionsPipeline.Translations - missing branch coverage
testing_backlog.detail: Tests for: (a) user with active debit skips balance check, (b) insufficient balance with languages.

testing_backlog.title: CaptionsChannel handle_in tests
testing_backlog.detail: captions_channel_test.exs exists but all tests are commented out. Revive: default pipeline, twitch pipeline, zoom pipeline, 'active' event.

testing_backlog.title: pipeline_to(:default) branches
testing_backlog.detail: Added 3 tests: passthrough, pirate mode, profanity blocklist. pipeline_to(:zoom) still untested - requires Bypass/new mock for HTTPoison.

testing_backlog.title: services/twitch.ex
testing_backlog.detail: Large Twitch API service, no tests. Thin wrappers over behavior mocks; moderate test value. get_live_streams has non-trivial chunk/sort/dedup logic.

maintainer_priorities: None noted yet - no maintainer comments on test-related issues.

completed_prs.description: Added 2 tests for untested branches in CaptionsPipeline.Translations.maybe_translate/3.
Added 3 tests for pipeline_to(:default): passthrough, pirate mode, profanity filter.

notes: Factory: insert(:bits_balance_debit, user: user) to create active debit. User factory has stream_settings: build(:stream_settings), bits_balance: build(:bits_balance) by default. translate_languages is has_many - pass as list in insert(:user, translate_languages: [...]). mix format/lint not runnable without Elixir installed in workflow runner. No Zoom mock - pipeline_to(:zoom) calls HTTPoison directly; would need Bypass or new behavior.

monthly_activity_issue.note: Created in this run as [Test Improver] Monthly Activity 2026-03. Previous issue #240 (incorrectly titled 2025-07) was closed.
